name: The Bart Bonte collection
description:
Flash is dead, long live the Bart Bonte collection!
A collection of 28 Flash games packaged and remastered for you!

Play these classic Bart Bonte games carefully remastered and packaged with a selection menu and loads of achievements.

This collection was made to survive the end of Flash in the browser and to preserve these games for you!
Thanks for your support!

Includes 28 full games:
  • 25
  • 40xEscape
  • A bark in the dark
  • A Bonte escape
  • Cat in Japan
  • Doggnation
  • Duck
  • Factory Balls
  • Factory Balls 2
  • Factory Balls 3
  • Factory Balls 4
  • Farafalla
  • Full Moon
  • Furiosity
  • In Drmzzz
  • Klikwerk
  • Loose the moose
  • Me and the Key
  • Me and the Key 2
  • Me and the Key 3
  • Must pop words
  • Piksels
  • Sugar, Sugar
  • Sugar, Sugar 2
  • Sugar, Sugar 3
  • What's inside the box?
  • Where is cat?
  • Yellow
